performance.performance_analysis: Debater 1 showed minimal engagement and preparation throughout the debate. Their contributions were superficial, lacking depth and nuance. They failed to engage with other debaters' arguments and showed limited understanding of the complexities of generative AI. Their sole substantive contribution was an oversimplified view on AI responsibility that ignored important stakeholder considerations.

Their response about AI professionals replacing non-users showed nuanced thinking.
